text: Ylva Julia Margareta Johansson (born 13 February 1964) is a Swedish politician. She was the European Commissioner for Home Affairs from 2019 to 2024. She was Minister for Schools of Sweden from 1994 to 1998, as Minister for Welfare and Elderly Healthcare from 2004 to 2006, and as Minister for Employment from 2014 to 2019. She has been a member of the Swedish Riksdag since 2006. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish politicians Category:European Union politicians Category:Lund University alumni
title: Ylva Johansson
